72 STATEMENT OF AUDITOR OP PUBLIC ACCOUNTS STATE OF NEBRASKA, OFFICE OF THE AUDITOR OF PUBLIC ACCOUNTS. It is hereby certified that the foregoing are true statements of the appropriations made and the moneys expended by the Thirty - second Session of the Legislature of the State of Nebraska, up to and including the 10th day of May, If 11, specifying the amount of each item, and to whom and for what paid as provided by Section 22, Article III, of the constitution. In testimony wherof, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my Official seal, this 10th day of May, 1911. (Seal.) SILAS R. BARTON rtest: Auditor of Public Accounts J. W. SHAHAN. Deputy Auditor.
